statements: DELETE FROM HistoricalData WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' AND value < 100
DELETE FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_id = 10 AND forecast_date < '2022-03-01' AND predicted_value > 100.0;
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE id = 5 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM forecast_data WHERE forecast_id = 10 OR forecast_date > '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM predictive_models WHERE model_name = 'Linear Regression';
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE id = 3 AND value > 100
DELETE FROM predictive_models WHERE model_name = 'Linear Regression' AND creation_date < '2022-01-01'
